level.heading: Executory contracts.
level.text: ยง 22-144 Executory contracts. Upon the vesting in the city of the right, title and interest of the state in and to such pier properties and as an incident thereto, there shall also vest in the city all the right, title and interest of the state in and to and in connection with any and all executory contracts and agreements in connection with such pier properties except as to moneys and rights accrued thereunder at the time of vesting of title as herein provided.
